experience: You and GG both know Bret Giles, Lance Faulkner, CSM, CSPO, and 37 others

Client List: Scorpion Bay, Torreon, Precision Science, Televerde, Storykind, August United, Remedy Pilates & Massage, Camelback Desert Schools, Workflow by Design, Dr. Jeffrey J. Ptak Aesthetic Surgery, Villas at Firerock, The Enclave

Brand management and strategy, concept, design and execution. Responsibilities also extended into leading the Fisher creative team and mentoring and developing young designers.Client List: Red Mountain Resort, Wigwam Resort, Abercrombie & Kent, Solstice Collection, Desert Troon Companies, Monterey Homes, Goodmans, Pinnacle West Capital Corporation, APS, Vektor Vodka, Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport, Phoenix Suns, AZ Diamondbacks, Oliver Smith Jeweler, Phoenix Country Day School, Metro Phoenix Partnership for Arts and Culture, Rubicon Race Team, Annexus, Maya Day + Night Club

Technically speaking, we didn’t have titles at CFD, we just wore many hats to get the job done. Depending on the day, I might have touched design, branding, art direction, conceptual development, naming, photoshoot direction, photoshoot coordination, account management, print management, press checking, client meetings, vendor meetings... whatever it took to complete a project. Client List: Globe Corporation, Phoenix Zoo, Phoenix Children's Hospital, The Cardon Group, St. Joseph's Hospital, Mercy Gilbert Hospital, Estilo Boutique, Malee's Thai Bistro, Kahala Corporation, Pinnacle West Capital Corporation, AZ Department of Health Services, Phoenix Suns, AZ Diamondbacks, Sacramento Kings, Vegas Grand Prix
Client List: Galco Purses, The FINOVA Group, Pinnacle West Capital Corporation, A.B. Watley, Soma Cafe, Desert Song Yoga, Grayhawk
Client List: Backroads, Boyd Gaming, Bombardier, FlexJet, Phelps Dodge Corporation, The Flynn Foundation
recommendations: Associate Creative Director at University of Phoenix & Director of Phoenix Design Week
July 13, 2016, Liz worked with GG but at different companies

My experience of working with GG was such a delight! We had the opportunity to bring her into a branding project for a Sitewire client. I worked with GG directly to get her up to speed on the brand platform, brand name direction and brand story created by the Sitewire team that would guide her to designing the perfect identity for the new brand. GG is very detailed in the work she does, asks all of the right questions and has the best attitude. She presented a variety of logo designs that aligned with the brand direction, which were then presented to the client. The client was thrilled with the possibilities and various ideas we brought to the table, all of which aligned directly to the brand platform. I would definitely recommend working with GG – her eye for design is flawless, she is very strategic through her creative process, her execution is amazing and she felt like part of the Sitewire team!

summary: www.SmidgeDesignStudio.comAs founder and creative director, GG oversees and manages all creative projects for Smidge Design Studio. With 18 years of creative agency experience, GG is as passionate about storytelling and design as she is about creating effective brand experiences for her clients. She’s had the pleasure of working with a breadth of companies spanning fortune 500 to boutique start-ups. GG’s unwavering commitment to exceptional design is demonstrated through her recognition in elite design publications such as Graphis, AR100, Print, HOW and Communication Arts and her work has been published in LogoLounge as well as various Rockport Publishing design books.Specialties: Visual Strategy, Brand Management, Design Development and Execution
name: GG LeMere
title: Founder & Creative Director, Smidge Design Studio
